name: Akshay Khanna

work_experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
work_experience.description:
Sure! Here's how you can tweak the job work experience section of your resume to highlight your relevant skills and accomplishments based on the responsibilities you provided:

Work Experience:

Senior Software Engineer, Microsoft
------------------------------

* Defined and executed a vision for next-generation autonomous cloud infrastructure, enabling M365 Sovereign and Regulated cloud offerings.
* Joined the new Special Cloud team as a founding member and innovated in the space of internet-scale distributed cloud systems.

Work Experience:

Software Engineer, WSD (Workplace Management Suite) Product Team
--------------------------------------------------------

* Developed and architected multiple product apps, microservices, REST API & UI components using Seismic (React JS), JS, Java & ServiceNow, SQL (Glide) DB & GenAI.
* Designed the architecture and led the complete development of a complex Scenario Planning (Office space planning & visualization) app, including a custom-built data visualization and planning UI component called Stack Plan.
* Created a recursive hierarchical tree visualization for complex data representation and manipulation.

I hope this helps you showcase your relevant skills and accomplishments in your resume!

work_experience.title: Senior Consultant
work_experience.description:
Sure! Here's how I would tweak the job work experience section of a resume for a Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft based on the provided job responsibilities:

Work Experience:

Senior Software Engineer, Microsoft
Dates of Employment: [Insert dates]

* Defined and executed a vision for the next generation of autonomous cloud infrastructure, enabling M365 Sovereign and Regulated cloud offerings. Led a team in the development of innovative solutions and contributed to the growth of the company through technical leadership.

Previous Experience:

Software Engineer, Atlassian
Dates of Employment: [Insert dates]

* Collaborated with the Design System Team to refactor and add features to Atlassian's core UI design components. Contributed to open-source libraries and wrote code mods (AST JSCodeShift) for easy shipping of these components.
* Built a complex distributed system for a leading UK Outdoor advertisement company, using Golang, Java, Python, and MongoDB. Implemented multiple microservices and REST APIs, followed DDD to build them, and managed the event-driven architecture using SNS & SQS. Created a UI using React Redux and solved inventory optimization problems using linear programming (GLPK).
* Wrote unit, integration, and contract tests for each microservice and followed TDD & pair programming.

Skills:

* Technical leadership
* Cloud infrastructure development
* Microservices architecture
* REST API design
* Golang, Java, Python programming
* MongoDB database management
* Event-driven architecture
* SNS & SQS messaging systems
* React Redux front-end development
* Linear programming (GLPK) optimization
* Test-driven development (TDD) and pair programming

Education:

Bachelor's/Master's Degree in Computer Science or related field, [Insert name of institution], [Insert dates of study]

work_experience.title: Product Developer
work_experience.description:
Sure! Here's how you can tweak your job work experience section to highlight the relevant skills and responsibilities for a Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft:

Job Work Experience:
Senior Software Engineer, Microsoft
Dates of Employment: [insert dates]

Responsibilities:

* Defined and executed a vision and roadmap for the next generation of autonomous cloud infrastructure, enabling M365 Sovereign and Regulated cloud offerings.
* Served as a founding member of the new Special Cloud team, responsible for innovating in the space of internet-scale distributed cloud systems.
* Developed and maintained patient list & task management app from scratch using Angular 5+ front-end and Java MVC (+ SQL) REST microservices on the back-end.
* Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop user stories, write unit tests (jasmine + karma + jUnit), identify bugs, and implement suggestions and enhancements to the product.
* Conducted demos after sprints and attended/led grooming, swarming, and retrospective meetings with product OPO's.

Skills:

* Strong experience in software development using Angular 5+ and Java MVC (+ SQL) microservices.
* Proficient in unit testing frameworks (jasmine + karma + jUnit).
* Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
* Experience with Agile methodologies and ability to work in fast-paced environments.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
work_experience.description:
Sure! Here's an updated version of your work experience section for a Senior Software Engineer role at Microsoft, based on the responsibilities you provided:

Work Experience:
Senior Software Engineer, Microsoft
Employment Dates: [Insert dates]

* Defined and executed a vision and roadmap for next-generation autonomous cloud infrastructure, enabling M365 Sovereign and Regulated cloud offerings.
	+ Led cross-functional teams to design and develop innovative internet-scale distributed cloud systems.
	+ Collaborated with stakeholders to identify and prioritize project requirements, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
	+ Conducted technical reviews and provided feedback on team members' designs and code quality.
* Joined the new Special Cloud team as a founding member and contributed to the development of cutting-edge cloud infrastructure solutions.
	+ Developed user stories and change requests for agile Java backend development, focusing on improving application stability and scalability.
	+ Created multiple automation scripts using various technologies (Java, Sikuli lib, C#, WPF, Selenium) to streamline project infrastructure work and enhance productivity.
	+ Implemented utilities for auto incident resolver on BMC IATM, server log management, and job scheduling to increase efficiency and reduce manual intervention.

I hope this updated version helps you showcase your experience and skills in a more concise and effective manner!
